name: Nonlinear Door 非线性之门
description:
story

You find yourself waking up in what looks like some kind of research room, where everything seems to be calm, but there is always a strong sense of discord. "Should I look like this??"

Main gameplay

Nonlinear Door is a third-person single-player puzzle game, the theme of the gameplay is the title of the "nonlinear door", in the game, the door of each room is not one-to-one correspondence, on the contrary, when you open the door, you don't know where the door will lead, each room actually has a certain degree of connection, not completely random, you can play the game to find out the law of the 'nonlinear door'.

Gameplay

There may be clues or puzzle games in each room, and players need to run back and forth between different rooms to collect clues and solve puzzles to further understand the background of the story and help the player finally complete the game.

suitable for players

Suitable for players who like maze and puzzle games
